summary: Lives of several people intertwine during an eventful day in Mumbai.
cast: Anupam Kher|Atul Kulkarni|Milind Gunaji|Aakash Pandey|Parvin Dabas|Perizaad Zorabian|Rajit Kapoor|Purab Kohli|Rajpal Yadav|Sarika|Sayaji Shinde|Seema Biswas|Smiley Suri|Vijay Raaz|Virendra Saxena|Shri Vallabh Vyas|Ashwin Mushran|Siddhant Karnick|Javed Abidh|Anil Chaudhary|Rakesh Dhawan|Master Faryaaz|Bharat Ganeshpure|Rajesh Jais|Baby Kayanash|Raj Ketkar|Ehsan Khan|Neelu Kohli|Sanam Kumar|Mohini|Natasha Oberoi|Lalit Parashar|Parveena|Maulik Pithadia|Dilip Raj|Hira Singh Rawat|Nagesh Sadrani|Pradip Sagar|Samta Sagar|Kasim Saifi|Kavita Seth|Vistar
title: Y.M.I. Yeh Mera India
